Berkeley with a B.A. in Computer Science (‚Äò22), and worked as a machine learning engineer (MLE) in the aerospace/defense industry for over a year. There, I worked on a variety of ML/AI projects involving designing, developing, and deploying deep learning models for real-world problems like quality control in additive manufacturing, synthetic data generation for object detectors and textures in 3D physics engines, and codon optimization for enhancing protein folding/expression.

Currently, I am most interested in generative AI for tasks in vision and audio. One day, I wish to eventually create an AI startup, likely in generative AI for music generation. My hobbies include music production, piano, chess, blackjack/poker, hiking, & cooking italian food.
